All three sizes had the same problem, so unfortunately, all are returned.

评论概述: For great and lots of compliments
评论详情: I’m 5 ft and was 165lb (36DD) at the time. I got an XL in the olive green color and it fit great. It’s a stretchy material so I had plenty of room and it still looked fitted. I love this dress. I will be ordering ore colors. This fits extremely well and is so comfortable. Easy to wash. I did not hand wash it, but I washed it on the gentle cycle in a lingerie bag and it was fine.

I didn’t have high hopes but this dress is actually awesome. It has a good amount of stretch and fits great. I ordered the medium but could haves sized down to small (5’6” and 135lbs). The dress I ordered didn’t come with a belt, but this brand sells belts in the same colors as the dresses so it matched perfect.
